bill_title: Honoring the Watertown High School boy's basketball team and the staff of the boy's basketball team.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the Watertown High School boy's basketball team and the staff of the boy's basketball team. WHEREAS, the 1999 Watertown Arrows won the South Dakota Class AA High School Boy's Basketball Championship with an admirable 16-7 record; and WHEREAS, Coach Gary Thomas and his staff provided leadership and guidance to the players and the fans provided loyal support; and WHEREAS, the boy's basketball team played with more emotion and intensity, focused on their goals, and saved the best for last to become state champions on and off the court: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Watertown High School boy's basketball team be recognized for their excellence for the 1998-1999 school year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the Watertown High School boy's basketball team and the staff of the boy's basketball team. WHEREAS, the 1999 Watertown Arrows won the South Dakota Class AA High School Boy's Basketball Championship with an admirable 16-7 record; and WHEREAS, Coach Gary Thomas and his staff provided leadership and guidance to the players and the fans provided loyal support; and WHEREAS, the boy's basketball team played with more emotion and intensity, focused on their goals, and saved the best for last to become state champions on and off the court: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Watertown High School boy's basketball team be recognized for their excellence for the 1998-1999 school year.
